name: Computer Clean Up
description:
"This game right here sucks totally" - homeless guy i showed this game to on the side of the street.

"Bruh :skull: wtf is this soundtrack" - radio station person when i tried to get him to play the soundtrack of this game on the local radio

"kys" - a twitter user when i thought my game was good (they didn't think the same as me)

"camm game" - very funny users of a discord server when i told them about this game
